name: Bumpit
description:
Submission for Global Game Jam 2017!

A musical battle arena! Control stick = move, A = jump, X = push.

Inspired by Mario Party's "Bumper Balls", this is a local 4-player game where the goal is to push the other players out of the arena.

NB: You'll need 4 gamepads connected in order to play.

Voices: Nicki Rapp

Music: Midimiai by rosenrotR. Retrieved from http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/718346 under CC license. TAK – PAE-KI (meganeki Remix), by meganeko. Retrieved from http://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/684892 under CC license.
